lead_paragraph: “Mia, a Dancer’s Journey,” having its New York premiere at the Walter Reade Theater, is part of the Dance on Camera festival.
snippet: “Mia, a Dancer’s Journey,” having its New York premiere at the Walter Reade Theater, is part of the Dance on Camera festival.
